DOC.brief_summary: Patients Central Retinal Vein Occlusion undergo vitrectomy , small needle 71 micron enter branch retinal vein TPA inject obstracted vein .
DOC.brief_title: Retinal Endo Vascular Surgery Central Retinal Vein Occlusion
DOC.detailed_description: Patients Central Retinal Vein Occlusion less 6 month duration reduction vision 6/21 go OCT FANG examination . Patient operate vitrectomy , branch retinal vein puncture small needle rTPA 200mcg/ml injected vein .
DOC.criteria: crvo le 6 month Visual Acuity le 6/21 No prior eye surgery except cataract . Retinal/iris neovascularization
